name: Asuna Invites to Party
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)］ When this card attacks, if a card named "《Star Splash》" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: Then, party up with me. It's been forever.

name: 《Lightning Flash》Asuna
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's stock.
flavorText: I'll protect you, too. I'll protect you forever.

name: Asuna's Commanding Strength
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the effect of a card named "Returning to the Front Lines", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room］ When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your 《Avatar》 characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll protect you…… So you protect me, okay?

name: Beacon of Hope, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. （This damage may be canceled） 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "On Top of the 《World Tree》" is in your climax area, until end of turn, all of your characters get +5000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's stock."
flavorText: ---Let's go!

name: Asuna Lays on the Sofa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a not an 《Avatar》 character, put it into your clock. (If it is, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Hey…… Kirito. Do you think it would be okay if we left the front lines for a bit.

name: Asuna's Married Life
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You must be hungry. Let's eat.

name: Vice Commander, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is two or more, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I, Asuna, Vice Commander of the Knights of the Blood Oath, will oversee this operation.

name: Asuna Joins a Party
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Yuuki(ユウキ)" or "Sleeping Knights(スリーピング・ナイツ)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: Okay, let's see how far we can go.

name: 《Lead Group》Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: But, I want to go back. There are lots of things I never had the chance to do there.

name: Asuna's Quiet Time
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When a card named "On Top of the 《World Tree》" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for a card named "Beacon of Hope, Asuna" and up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Suu Fylla Heill Austr!

name: Vestige of an Elder Sister, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Memory [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if a card named "《Sword Skill Lore》 Yuuki" is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Really? What is it you wanted to give me?

name: Restful Stroll, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Innocent and Uninhibited, Yuuki" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Innocent and Uninhibited, Yuuki" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Thank you, Yui.

name: Childhood Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 0 or lower, put this card into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: "You know what Grandpa said? He said not to fuss, because he and Grandma were so proud of you."

name: 《ALO》 Days, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Asuna Takes Shelter
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: It kind of feels, like I was born and raised here for my entire life, it's just a feeling.

name: Autumn Walk, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Today we both just happened to be dressed in "colors from the past." What are the odds of that?

name: Asuna Putting Herself in the Front Lines
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: So I'll accept your offer, and take it easy today.

name: Asuna Replies to a Proposal
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. （The revealed cards are returned to their original place)
flavorText: …… Yes.

name: 《Berserk Healer》 Asuna
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Demise of 《Zekken》" is in your climax area, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I guess I’ll use this one.

name: Asuna Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Beacon of Hope, Asuna" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Let's go.

name: Asuna Changes Clothes
text: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Kyaa!?

name: Self-sacrifice
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Kirito: "No, Asuna…… This can't…… This can't be……"

name: Demise of 《Zekken》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: 《Star Splash》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Yaaaa!!

name: On Top of the 《World Tree》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Asuna: "Yui……"

name: Undefeated Super Swordsman, Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Yer not gonna let us get by you, is that what yer sayin'?

name: 《Sleeping Knights》 Talken & Nori & Jun
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage with "Yuuki(ユウキ)" or "Asuna(アスナ)" in its card name gets +1 level and +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Asuna: "A toast to this gathering of friends, new and old――"

name: 《Zekken》 Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 《Net》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "《Mother's Rosario》" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +1 level until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Is there anyone else out there wanna take me on today-?

name: Leafa's Pure Wish
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your deck is five or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +1500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from your hand into your waiting room］ Until end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +3000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavorText: I'll be waiting. I'll be waiting for you to come home for real.

name: Virtual and Reality, Leafa & Suguha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Fairy Dance" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I don't think it's just a game, not right now.

name: Yuuki's Raised Antenna
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Asuna Joins a Party" get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"Asuna Joins a Party" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Asuna Joins a Party" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: I picked ya, 'cuz you're the only one who can help us.

name: 《Sword Skill Lore》 Yuuki
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(4) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When another of your "Vestige of an Elder Sister, Asuna" attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put eleven cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of 【TRIGGER】 trigger icons revealed among those cards. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Take this. It's my Original Sword Skill.

name: Reliable Guide, Leafa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose another of your characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I've been playing this game a long time.

name: Time Limit, Leafa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It's all black, except for that one clear spot!

name: 《Imp》 Girl, Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What's up! Y'next?

name: Sibling Moment, Suguha
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When a card named "Fairy Dance" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Virtual and Reality, Leafa & Suguha" in your hand, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Brother.

name: Memories That Were Fun, Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's clock." (The revealed card is returned to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, each player puts the top card of his or her deck into the waiting room. If the level of the card put into your waiting room with this effect is higher than the level of the card put into your opponent's waiting room with this effect, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Who should I marry…… Oh, I know! You!

name: Simultaneous Attack, Leafa
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters in your center stage, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: The gold one's tough; nothing we do's slowin' him down.

name: "Speedholic" Leafa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Now, follow me!

name: 《Sylph》Girl, Leafa
text: 【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.) 【ACT】［【REST】 two of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters］ This card gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll draw as much of their attention as I can, so try and knock one down.

name: Gathering Materials, Leafa
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.)
flavorText: We're not done yet by a long shot.

name: Innocent and Uninhibited, Yuuki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yeah.

name: 《Sleeping Knights》 Yuuki
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with "Asuna(アスナ)" or "Sleeping Knights(スリーピング・ナイツ)" in its card name, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You got it!

name: Asuna & Yuuki
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: I gave this life… everything I had…… I was alive……

name: Tutor, Suguha
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power.
flavorText: I could be your tutor.

name: 《Sleeping Knights》 Siune & Tecchi
text: 【CONT】 If you have a card named "Asuna Joins a Party" and "《Sleeping Knights》 Yuuki", this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Braves of 27th floor" is in your climax area, choose up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and this card gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Asuna: "――To us."

name: Recon's Courage
text: Choose one of your characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose up to one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: ……Then, I'll help.

name: 《Mother's Rosario》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Fairy Dance
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Hey, Kirito. Let's dance.

name: Braves of 27th floor
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Gathering Materials, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Did you get all the materials?

name: Strong and Stout-hearted, Lisbeth
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use "Accelerate", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Let's get the lead out and kick his giant ass.

name: Trusted Skills, Lisbeth
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +1 level and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Your weapons are all restored and ready for action!

name: Lisbeth Changes Clothes
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters.
flavorText: Wah……

name: Like a Younger Sister, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Pina's Resurrection" is in your climax area, choose up to one character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to one card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: If I told him I wanted to talk a little more, would he laugh at me……

name: Lisbeth's Professional Pride
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【AUTO】 Accelerate ［Put the top card of your deck into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Don't you insult me. Believe it or not, I'm an expert mace user.

name: Silica Looking Up At the Sky
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: "As of 14:55, November 7, the game has been cleared--"

name: Silica's Unyielding Trust
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Familiar》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: You're a good person…… so I wouldn't be scared.

name: Unknown Identity, 《Death Gun》
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, if this card's battle opponent is 《Target》, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character." 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your oppponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level and 《Target》 until end of turn.

name: 《Cait Sith》 Girl, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is not an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Dragon》 character, at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room. (The revealed card is returned to its original place.)
flavorText: It's nice to meet you.

name: Searching Lisbeth
text: 【AUTO】[(1)］ When this card attacks, if a card named "Seeking Warmth" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose a card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I, too, was always looking for something. Something real in this world.

name: Sterben 《Death Gun》
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your opponent's characters are 《Target》, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Fateful Estoc Wielder" is in your climax area, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText:
You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.You don't know my name.
That's why you'll never remember it.

name: Light-hearted Talk, Kyoji
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose up to two characters, and those characters get 《Target》 until end of turn.
flavorText: No problems on that front, Instructor.

name: Shoichi Shinkawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Weapon》 characters get +500 power. 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters in the center stage get 《Target》.
flavorText: Kikuoka: "Upon returning, Shoichi only spoke about it to Kyoji. Just how much he was feared in that world as a real mass murderer."

name: Familiar, Pina
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Silica(シリカ)" in its card name get +500 power. 【AUTO】［Put this card into your waiting room］ When another of your characters with "Silica(シリカ)" in its card name is put into the waiting room from the stage, if this card is on the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage postition as 【REST】.
flavorText: Kyuru.

name: Sinister Glint,《Death Gun》
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to one of your opponent's level 0 or lower 《Target》 characters, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: It's time I found out if you're the real deal, or a fake.

name: Fluffy on the Head, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room with "Silica(シリカ)" or "Pina(ピナ)" in its card name, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Change [(3) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Battle Stance, Silica" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Haaa.

name: Lisbeth's Determined Confession
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 [(2)］ When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
I want to be your exclusive smith.
I want to be your exclusive smith.
I want to be your exclusive smith.
I want to be your exclusive smith.
I want to be your exclusive smith.

name: Excessive Obsession, Kyoji
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Weapon》 characters get +1000 power. 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters in the back stage get 《Target》.
flavorText: Asada, you did tell me, right? To wait.

name: Battle Stance, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do not, put this card into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your waiting room, if you have another character with "Pina(ピナ)" in its card name, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Dragon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Right!

name: Lisbeth's Shining Smile
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck.

name: 《Demonic Sword Gram》
text: Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. Until end of turn, your opponent cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand.
flavorText: I'm amazed you're still alive!

name: Seeking Warmth
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: ……it's warm. You and I are both data in a virtual world, but……

name: Pina's Resurrection
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Pina…… I'll talk to you lots and lots, okay?

name: Fateful Estoc Wielder
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: ――《Star Splash》 Octet Blast――

name: Last Shot, Sinon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Phantom Bullet" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal four damage to your opponent. When this damage is canceled, this card gets +3500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Kirito…………!

name: Temporary Alliance, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters with "Sinon(シノン)" in its card name, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: I'm gonna charge him, so back me up, okay?

name: Temporary Alliance, Sinon
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: ……roger that.

name: "Machine of Ice" Sinon
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your oppponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup" from your hand."
flavorText:
――ice. I am a machine made of cold, hard ice.
――ice. I am a machine made of cold, hard ice.
――ice. I am a machine made of cold, hard ice.
――ice. I am a machine made of cold, hard ice.
――ice. I am a machine made of cold, hard ice.

name: Getting the Holy Sword, Kirito
text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is two or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: You don't know how much this means to me!

name: Demon of 《Dual-wielding》, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card attacks, if your level is 3 or higher and the number of cards in your clock is six, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Very well, if you'd rather settle this with swords, that's fine with me.

name: 《SAO Survivor》 Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We fought before, when we were stuck in another game.

name: In the Sunlight Forest, Sinon
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Search you deck for up to X 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Choose X cards from your hand, and put them into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of climax revealed among those cards.
flavorText: ……I think.

name: Choice to Fight, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 《Net》 characters you have.
flavorText: To fight, or not to fight, it means that we have that choice!

name: In the Face of “Death”, Kirito & Sinon
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Kirito: "And I won't let a single one of 'em hit you."

name: Strong Existence, Sinon
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Last Shot, Sinon" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: If I get knocked out, I'm going to retire.

name: Kirito Discovers a Unique Skill
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 ［Put all markers from underneath this card into your waiting room］ When another of your characters attack, if the number of markers underneath this card is five or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, and this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: ……aaaAAAAAAH!!

name: 《Black Swordsman》 Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 [(3) Put a card from your hand into your clock］ When a card named "《Dual-wielding》 User" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +3500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may 【STAND】 this card." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to is its original place)
flavorText: I'm going to win. I'm going to win and end this game.

name: Blade User, Klein
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. （The revealed cards are returned to their original place) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Oh, Kirito! It's been a while.

name: Brains of the Party, Yui
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is six or more, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: I"ll lock on to the coordinates!

name: Challenging Many, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Providing Information, Yui
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your characters with "Kirito(キリト)" or "Asuna(アスナ)" in its card name is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: They found a different quest.

name: Kirito's Strong Bond
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Asuna(アスナ)" in its card name get +500 power. 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.
flavorText: My life belongs to you, Asuna. So I will use it for you.

name: Angry Sinon
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Kirito's Natural Gentleness
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kirito Discovers a Unique Skill" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I don't mind. Don't worry about it.

name: 《Skill Connect》 Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Quest to Get 《Excalibur》" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Shuffle your deck] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "《Skill Connect》 Kirito", 【STAND】 this card. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: Go-!

name: Late Self-introduction
text: If you do not have a character with "Kirito(キリト)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose one of your characters, and until end of turn, that character gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card. Put this card into your stock.
flavorText:
Sinon: "No way…………A guy…………?
With that avatar………………?"Sinon: "No way…………A guy…………?
With that avatar………………?"Sinon: "No way…………A guy…………?
With that avatar………………?"

name: Phantom Bullet
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: ――Last attack. Phantom Bullet――

name: 《Dual-wielding》User
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Wwwoooooaaah!!

name: Quest to Get 《Excalibur》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I really appreciate you guys, helpin' me out on such short notice!

name: Inherited Sword Skill, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card get +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Demise of 《Zekken》" is in your climax area, and the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, look at up to three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Your sword will live on until the end of time.

name: Attack in Waves, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters in front of this card get +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When your other character attacks, if a card named "Quest to Get 《Excalibur》" is in your climax area, and the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is four or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your cards named "Attack in Waves, Kirito" and this card, and exchange them. (The card orientation does not change)
flavorText: I’m going in!

name: Comforting Moment, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 [Return two characters in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may put this card into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: It's almost time! I better get over there.

name: Agile Start, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.

name: Quest to Get 《Excalibur》
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Ha!

name: Summer Festival, Suguha
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place) 【AUTO】 When your opponent levels up, if a card named "Fairy Dance" is in your climax area, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Adventure with Everyone, Leafa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [Put two characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that battle opponent into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: We're gonna finish this quest for Tonky! Right, Kazuto?

name: Adventure with Everyone, Lisbeth
text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is two or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: Go on, get in there!

name: Adventure with Everyone, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of other characters you have is one or less, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character on any postion of your back stage.
flavorText: I beatchya!

name: After Party, Keiko
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Huh? Who is. You mean Kirito?

name: Rika Delighted at the Meeting
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: So anyway, I'm super stoked you're here; it's always cool to meet another girl VRMMO player.

name: Attack in Waves, Kirito
text: 【CONT】 When this card is played from your hand, you may choose one of your cards named "After the Battle, Kirito", and put it into your waiting room. If you do, you may play this card with 0 cost. 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose one of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Switch out!

name: After the Battle, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [①【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, perform the following action. "Draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: I'm not sure, but it's the best I got.

name: Determination with Life on the Line, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may reveal up to three cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed one or more cards, choose up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Lisbeth: "The only time he'll take a fight seriously now, is if the game stops being a game."

name: Adventure with Everyone, Yui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Return this card to your hand] When a climax is put on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: You can count on me, Mommy!

name: Frightened Eyes, Sinon
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards and "Backup" from your hand.
flavorText: ……Then, you're scared of him, too?

name: Intense Spirit, Klein
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Freyja--!

name: “Dicey Cafe” Gilbert
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it on the bottom of his or her deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Y'all don't hafta come here every time you're on a date, there's classier places in town you could go to.

name: Adventure with Everyone, Sinon
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have.
flavorText: Don't look at me like that, you can have it.

name: 《Star Splash》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Awakened Feelings
text: 【CONT】All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: It's nothing!!

name: Mission in the Twilight, Sinon
text: CONT@ Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. AUTO@ When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm getting a bad vibe from that guy.

name: Sinon Takes on a Powerful Opponent
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: It IS a game, so you can at least have the balls to face death here instead of whinin’!

name: Heading for the Memorable Floor 22, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each character on your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes REVERSE in battle, your opponent may choose a character in your waiting room, and put it on the top of your deck.

name: Promise to Meet Again, Kirito
text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your opponent's waiting room is five or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When another of your "Avatar" or "Net" characters attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
